Go to https://wiki.ubuntu.com/BinaryDriverHowto
That (and nothing else) is what you should follow. ALL drivers are IN Ubuntu as packages, you do NOT need to downlaod external drivers.
Essentially what you need are xorg-driver-fglrx fglrx-control and linux-restricted-modules-2.6.12-KERNELVERSION
